name: houseman
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a male or female doctor working in a hospital who is in their first year after completing their medical degree: He persuaded a fellow houseman to examine him and pronounce him cured. She was a qualified doctor working as a houseman in a hospital pathology department. Synonym
house officerCompare
consultant
junior doctor
registrar
More examplesFewer examplesAt that time I had completed my medical training and my year as a junior houseman.A young houseman came in wearing a white coat.One of the doctors came to the ward to see my mother - a houseman, a registrar, I'm not sure which one it was.There had been a staff rotation two weeks earlier when two new housemen had been appointed to the unit.
